gui.socialInteractions.tooltip.report.di: Mojang chat reporting is currently unavailable.
gui.socialInteractions.tooltip.report.no: %s cannot be reported to Mojang, because they haven't said anything.
This server or player has disabled reporting chat to Mojang.
gui.chatReport.describe: Sharing details will help Mojang make a well-informed decision. Keep in mind that these reports are not seen by server admins.
gui.nochatreport.secureChat: This option is disabled to prevent accidentally hiding random players' chat messages. Use Social Interactions to ignore individual players.
gui.nochatreport.noReporting: This server has disabled reporting chat to Mojang.
gui.nochatreports.status_secure: Others' messages cannot be reported to Mojang.
gui.nochatreports.status_unintrusive: Others' messages may be reportable to Mojang. Whether that is the case can be confirmed from Social Interactions.
gui.nochatreports.status_insecure: Others' messages can be reported to Mojang.
gui.nochatreports.status_realms: Others' messages can be reported to Mojang. Mojang is also monitoring chat for potential offenses to Community Standards.
gui.nochatreports.status_unknown: Chat reporting status is not yet known. Send a message to get the status.
gui.nochatreports.status_undefined: Chat reporting status is unknown due to an error. Try restarting the game.
gui.nochatreports.status_signing_allowed: Your messages are always reportable on Realms.
Your messages are reportable to Mojang. Click and re-join the server to try disabling it.
Your messages are reportable to Mojang. Re-join the server to disable it.
gui.nochatreports.status_signing_denied: Your messages are not reportable to Mojang. Click to enable.
gui.nochatreports.status_signing_denied_: Your messages are not reportable to Mojang because the server disabled it.
gui.nochatreports.realms_warning.content:
Important info about Realms:
• Chat can always be reported to Mojang.
• Mojang is monitoring chat for potential offenses to Community Standards.
• Profanity filter is enabled by default. If you are an adult, you can disable it for yourself on minecraft.net.
